RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector

RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector Class Reference

#include <languageselector.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The language selector dialog.

When you launch RainbruRPG for the first time, this dialog appears to let you select the default language.

Please see the Options::xmlLanguage documentation for a deeper view of the language list.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

An enumeration definining the FOX identifiers.

This identifiers are needed by the FOX toolkit to handle events. The only instance of this class is created by Launcher::create().

Enumerator:
ID_BUTTON  The FOX identifier of an unimplemented button.
ID_BTN_CANCEL  The FOX identifier of the 'Cancel' button.
ID_BTN_OK  The FOX identifier of the 'OK' button.
ID_CHANGE_SNAP  The language combobox selection change.
ID_LAST  Internally used identifier.

long RainbruRPG::Gui::LanguageSelector::onNotImplemented ( FXObject *  o,
FXSelector  s,
void *  v 
)

An event receiver used during development.

The widgets that send a usefull signal that have unimplemented event handler are connected to this to avoid compilation errors.
